titles.title: NFIP Risk Rating 2.0 Delay Act of 2021

A bill to temporarily limit the authority of the Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to prescribe chargeable premium rates for flood insurance under the National Flood Insurance Program.
NFIP Risk Rating 2.0 Delay Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
NFIP Risk Rating 2.0 Delay Act of 2021
This bill freezes premium rates for flood insurance provided through the National Flood Insurance Program through September 30, 2022.
